text: Great, thanks! That tool should be added to your account now. In the design manager if you go to the @marketplace folder and find the theme you downloaded, you can now right click on the theme and see an option to create a child theme. Once you create the child theme you will see a blank CSS file that you will be able to add CSS to.
Hi <@ULCSUPTGU> Thanks for your answer. We've already down this action , the issue came from the connexion between design manager and the child theme. Thank you again
